snippet: Some costumed characters in Times Square ripped off their mammoth heads on Tuesday, showing their real faces to protest what they call a "hostile move" by police telling tourists they don't have to tip for photos....

headline.print_headline: Times Square Characters Upset at 'Hostile' Police
headline.main: Times Square Characters Upset at 'Hostile' Police

lead_paragraph: Some costumed characters in Times Square ripped off their mammoth heads on Tuesday, showing their real faces to protest what they call a "hostile move" by police telling tourists they don't have to tip for photos.
